title: (x) The McGraw Hill Companies - FF Meta {Eduardo, Mark S}
content:
hello,   
what type is this??   
the McGraw Hill Companies ![Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124134im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28539.gif)   
   
thanks
author: trama

comments.content: It seems to be a customized version of [Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124134/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-meta/bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=The%a0McGraw-Hill%a0Companies&p=36). Some of the characters are virtually identical, but others are not.

thanks Eduardo and Mark.   
your comments are wright   
   
the �new w� works very well!!   
the (w)is similar to the w from the fedra sans type   
   
thanks
